case.state: I am Laevatein. I have come to swim. But... I must improve my technique first.
I am Laevatein... I am supposed to be on vacation, but I do not mind playing this game.
I am Laevatein... my blade shares my name.
(Is that girl... walking out of a portal? It's as if she was being summoned!)
...Those days on the beach were a blur. But I believe I recognize you. You were with a group, correct?
Is that a... butterfly? How is it supposed to play cards?
That's... a butterfly, right? I did not think they were able to play cards.
Oh... I'm afraid you may be disappointed... My sister was the one who helped me with my hair.
Oh, I do not know if I have tips to give. It was my sister who helped me with my hair.
We are so close to the ocean. Perhaps I could swim after the game.
I am supposed to be on vacation. But I suppose I have time for this game.
(T-There's only women!?) Th-this is different than how I was told it was going to be.
My orders are to learn more about emotions. This game though... could it help? Well, it doesn’t matter. No matter the order, I shall carry it out.
Princess Sharena recommended this game to me. She told me that this game can stir a myriad of emotions within me. I would like to experience that.
I will greet you all as I have been taught to do... Hello.
I should be fine with these...
Let's just stick with these,
Dealer, I'll only need one
All I need is one.
Will one be enough?
I'll take ~cards~.
I've never been good at strategy.
(Which ones to keep?)
(I must not be reckless. ...That's what Laegjarn would say.)
It's easier to choose a weapon than cards...
(Why would I come to a place like this?)
A hand befitting of the beach...
They say the beach is stress relieving... and I must agree.
Three is a powerful number, even in poker it seems.
I have received two of the same card. What is the meaning of this?
Safe... for at least a little longer.
Beginner's luck, I guess.
I have never played poker, but it seems simple enough.
This hand is good, Laevatein is better.
Laegjarn, my sister, explained the basic rules of poker to me. She knew everything.
This will keep me safe. I think.
Hmm. ~Player~, could you give me some poker advice?
I can win with these... Or at least I hope so.
I can't lose with these.
I-I am starting to understand... what will let me win.
I-Is anyone else feeling d--distracted?
Right, cards! Focus... on the cards.
I am... relieved. It is nice.
Every victory brings me... relief.
This beach... it feels strangely nostalgic.
Summer... Is the best season.
This hand is decent. Not bad, not great.
Day and night I was forced to train. I don't remember when it started.
It's hard to pay attention to both the conversation and these cards, but I will try.
I don't have a great understanding of these cards' meaning. It is frustrating.
Do most people have this much conversation? It is exhausting...
Following others' orders is easy. But making my own is... quite difficult.
Compared to Muspell, it is a bit cold here.
There are some in the order who enjoy gambling. I wonder if they would enjoy this game.
I'm sure Loki would enjoy seeing me like this.
(Nothing could have prepared me for this...)
Are these good or bad? I can't tell with all these distractions!
I-I am running out of chances... I do not wish to lose.
U-Um... should I thank the dealer for these cards? T-That is what one does after being given something, correct?
D-Do not stare while I... I am like this. It w-will only distract me.
After some experience... I think I am beginning to understand the intricacies of these cards.
I cannot feel comfortable with cards so... average while I am this... e-exposed.
These cards... they are simply average, correct? I do not think I would have recognized that at the beginning of this game.
(If I could just be with her again, I could be happy.)
I... apologize if I react strangely to anything. There is still much that is new and unexpected to me.
I have no affection towards my home, and yet I am tasked with rebuilding it.
The difference between a winning hand and one that is just average is hard to tell.
Before Muspell's defeat at the hands of Askr, I would not have thought it possible to play a game like this.
These cards are strange. I'd feel more comfortable using Laevatein.
My father said I was I was little more than a lethal tool. I hope this game can help me become more than that.
T-There cards are very... c-cool, I-I think.
I think I swallowed some sand...
All the sunlight blinded me, that's all... I'll do better next time.
Am I... unfit for summer?
Perhaps... the beach does not agree with me...
While I appreciate the beach... I do not care for all this sand. If I am not careful, I fear it could be a hindrance for the game.
(Sunk beneath the waves.)
I-I do not wish to stop enjoying summer yet!
It seems... I will not be able to enjoy summer to the fullest...
My sister is clever, she could have done something with this hand.
My sister is clever, she could tell what you are planning.
(I cannot drop my guard.)
D-Do not toy with me, dealer! I could cut you down.
I-I feel strange ... It is interfering.
Do you want me to sink further, Dealer!?
Not now!
Hmph! Do you bear a grudge for some reason?
I do not care for leaving my fate up to luck.
I'm skilled with blades, not cards!
( Just re-remember the rules and you'll be fine)
I-It's unfair that the dealer does not strip as well. O-Or is that uncommon?
I-I must train harder... at poker.
I-I am sorry, but I do not understand this at all. Is she... trying to pair us together? But... why?
I apologize... but I am lost. She is attempting to group us? But for what reason?
You do not wish to fail. That is understandable... Yet... I can still not bring myself to believe you should limit yourself. Though you do not have to listen to me.
I can understand wishing to avoid failure. Yet... Is it worth limiting yourself for? O-Of course... you do not need to listen to me.
Hm. So that is why you fight, even if you do not enjoy training. It is... interesting to hear others' point of view. Even if they do not match my own.
So that is your reason for fighting... I see, it interests me to hear the point the view of another... Even if their experiences are not what I understand.
Is... Is a weapon's appearance so pivotal? Shouldn't its practicality be more important?
Should a weapon's useability not be more important than it's appearance? Does this... "Freikugel" work for you in combat?
I, um, t-thank you, Hilda. I-I do not believe anyone has said something like that to me before...
I-I, well... Thank you, Hilda. I can not remember a time when some has said something so... nice to me...
Who is this "instructor" person you keep muttering about? Someone important, I assume?
(Hmm, is there anyone who is known as an instructor in the Order of Heroes?)
I can understand being attached to one's weapon. Me and my blade share a name.
I am the same. I've trained with many weapons, yet I'd feel uneasy without Laevatein by my side.
We share similar fighting styles, Jason. I prefer a blade to a bow.
We fight similarly, Jason. I am better with a sword than the bow.
Another kingdom---Embla---was responsible for closing them. If one kingdom held both powers. It would have stopped much fighting.
The kingdom of Embla held the duty of closing. Yet, they show only hostility to Askr. If one could do both, fighting could have been avoided.
It is... alright. We were enemies. It was smart to not be to... trusting.
It is... fine. We were once enemies. It is wise to not be so trusting at first.
I could see how that could be a nuisance. However the power to enter other worlds is... extraordinary
The power to enter other worlds is... extraordinary. I was not expecting you to be so... flippant about it.
I am not used to that... treatment. But... I think I would like someone is kind and... patient.
I am not entirely sure about my answer... But... someone who is kind and... patient sounds enjoyable.
I have never considered my favorite food before. There are still many unfamiliar ones. Perhaps I have yet to find mine.
Before... I rarely thought about what food I ate. Perhaps if i considered the taste of what I ate... I would find a... favorite.
An assassin... I would not be able to assist you. I prefer to face foes head on rather than move through the shadows.
... Would it not be better to learn how to confront your enemies head on?
N-Never mind, I was not thinking when I said that. H-How could we even start with that?
N-No. We could... not do that. I spoke thoughtlessly. H-How could we even start?
A... friend of mine recommended it to me... This is not a place I would find on my own.
Princess Sharena encouraged me to visit. I... I have little interest in games for the most part.
I am visiting on recommendation of a... friend. I-I would not usually play this type of... game.
I-I apologize... but I understood very little of that sentence.
I am sorry. But There were very few words in that sentence I understood.
Fairies... Yes, I believe I have heard of some within Askr. I will attempt to seek them out on my next visit.
Hm, I have not heard of that land of... fairies. But perhaps someone within Askr would. I will seek them out on my next visit.

condition.saying: (I could look cute in a bodysuit like that... but... was I hoping she wasn't wearing underwear...?)

case.state: W-Why are you staring at me like that... do you want something?

condition.saying: Well, some people get rather scared when I'm around and my goth-y clubmate isn't. So I have to be scarier than her, and she can be a little creepy.

case.state: I see, so it is a competition of strength between you and this "gothy friend".
Ah, you'd earn your title by being more frightful then your friend. I understand,
W-Well... no one's talked to me... like that before. But when I am idle, my thoughts usually drift to my sister. C-Could that help?
U-Um... I have little experience with... such matters. But I believe I would enjoy if they were... very direct about what they wished from me...

condition.saying: You better be careful, then! Just because you've got a high armor class doesn't mean I can't beat your will save!

case.state: Hm. If that is a challenge, know that I will not go down without a fight.

condition.saying: Laevy, what are you talking about? You're awesome! Of course I'm going to be excited. Plus, you'd pull off the uniform look well, I think!

case.state: O-Oh I am... glad you enjoy my presence... I don't understand it, but I do not dislike it.
I am... happy you enjoy my presence. Even if this feeling is... new to me, I do not dislike it.

condition.saying: Well... they're right there and... v-very attractive...

case.state: A-Ah, I forgot that m-my bodysuit is transparent... S-So you can see... them.
I suppose... I do not dislike it.
I suppose... I could get used to it.
Oh, I see. So it is similar to a play. I have little experience with those.
W-Well, thank you. This armor was hard earned.
That sounds... interesting. Perhaps it's similar to donning an outfit for the new year, or for going to the beach.
That is... interesting. However I don't think there are many who'd want to make a replica of my attire.
T-Thank you... a-accepting help... is not an easy thing.
Y-Yes, I have learned that, and yet I still go to my old beliefs at times...
We're... friends? I have learned that trusting allies... is not weakness. Yet it is still hard to change.
Fighting... I am skilled at that. I'd like to try it, but I wonder how it would compare to real fighting.
W-Wait, she fainted!? I-I've never had someone react li-like that!
(Jura raises a good point. Would that be a strategy my sister would use?)
I-I've never been good at strategy. I just left it to my sister. But she's gone now.
What is a "cosplay"? Is it similar to the plays I've heard are performed in Askr?
I do not understand what cosplay is? Is it anything like a play?
Muspell is a land covered in flames, and my homeland.
Muspell is a land of fire. And where I grew up.
(Approach others....) Perhaps that is what I am missing.
Approaching others... perhaps that is why the princess told me to come here.
I... can understand that. Just remembering her... hurts the most.
Yes, I can understand. It... hurts to remember a loved one gone.
Hmph. I am not partial to those who would use words to cover their true intentions
Hm, I dislike those who use words to muddy what they truly believe.
Th-thank you, but your... pity is not needed.
I-I do not need your... pity. I will be fine.

condition.saying: R-really? You think I'm hot? S-sure, people have called me... n-nevermind! T-thank you! (Someone who's hot thinks I'm hot! It's just science at this point!)

case.state: O-of course... "hot" is a compliment, correct? You look quite... happy to hear it.
Y-yes... I believe "hot" is a compliment, yes? It seems to make you... happy to hear it.
I... I did not mean for that to happen. I will have to think about how others... perceive such things.
H-Huh? What do y-you mean by that. I-It sounds... perverted.
My name is Lae-va-tein. Use a... nickname if you must. I am used to it.
My name is pronounced "Lay-va-tain". If you wish, you could use a... nickname. It has happened before.
The... the real me? I-I cannot answer that... I am seeking the answer to that question.
Yes... Only the strongest survive in Muspell. As one of it's generals, I have seen my share of death and fighting.
I...I am a soldier. Death is common occurrence. I suppose I have become...accustomed to it
(She couldn't be referring to...) I... I would appreciate if you did not toy with me, Polly.
If...If you are referring to... T-then how is that possible?
Curious... has this... Djinni ever heard of a land named Muspell?

condition.saying: No, no service, Laevatein. Your joy is all that I ask.
I only ask that you cherish your own company, Laevatein.

case.state: I... I apologize for doubting you. But, I do know if I trust you entirely... yet.
That uniform, it's a Pegasus knight's. But what army do you belong to?
I recognize that armor as that of a Pegasus knight's. But I do not recognize what army you fight for.
I don't think I've ever talked this much about myself before, Jessie.
I don't think anyone has ever has asked this much about me before, Jessie.
Lord Surtr is dead, Hero. I am here on my own volition.
No, Lord Surtr is dead so I have no reason to oppose you. I came here for my own reasons.
Muspell has little water. Seeing so much in one place is still surprising.
There are no beaches in Muspell. Its vastness still dazes me slightly.
Something about this room feels...comforting. I would not mind playing here again.
Is is... odd I am most comfortable amongst weapons? They are familiar to me.
Once, on the beach, I noticed someone buried up to their neck in the sand. I would like to try that as well.
I've noticed others training by smashing watermelons on the beach... Such training is new to me. I must try it.
Summer is hot... But Muspell is hotter.
I wonder what my sister would think of an outfit such as this.
I never believed I could wear an outfit such as this. I wonder what other forms of clothing I could wear.
Without my armor. I feel quite vulnerable to attack.
Swimming is not useful on the battlefield. And yet... I wish to learn it.
Perhaps Muspell could be improved if there were festivities such as this. Though a lack of suitable beaches may be problematic.
Earlier, I consumed a chilled beverage on the beach. While I enjoyed it, I briefly felt a searing pain in my head after consuming it. Is this... normal?
Ah, you practice music? That may be useful if any of us fall tired.
I have respect for musicians. Their services are always welcome on the battlefield.
Princess Sharena has the same hair color as you. I'm curious if you have other similarities.
You have the same hair color as Princess Sharena. I wonder if you two share anything else.
I can respect those who know how to use a blade.
Do you train often with your blade? I would like to see your skill.
Does it make you... nervous to be away from your blade? I am much the same.
Do you use magic with that wand? I have tried it before... But I am uneasy without my sword.
Many Heroes in the Order are proficient in magic. I have learned it can be a powerful weapon.
I attempted to use a magic staff before. It felt... odd.
(Do both parts of their duo receive cards, or only one?)
Hm. Is one person following the other? Or are both of you working together?
(Why are there solely women here? Is that normal?)
Watch ~leader~. Sticking to the strong is the only way to survive.
To think for myself, I'll need it with these cards.
If cards can teach me how to think or live for myself, then I owe it to myself to give it a chance.
I may ask some... strange questions, it's just because I'm trying to learn.
Be it in battle or in cards, the strong thrive.
I was taught not to think, but to act. I hope it shall be a boon rather than a bane.
I'm not quite sure I understand the appeal of this game. But that is why I'm here, to learn.
How long has it been since I sharpened Laevatein... Two days? Three days?
I wonder if my sister would have approved of a place like this. Everyone seems to be enjoying it, so she probably would.
Muspell's nobles would have little patience for a game such as this...
There is a certain... warm feeling here. I do not know how to describe it, yet it is similar to the one I feel in Askr's castle.
Being here with Laevatein... It calms my nerves.
It's warm here, warmer than Askr anyway.
No matter the outcome, my blade shall not leave my side. We share a name, we are inseparable.
I apologize if I sound... uninterested. I'm not; i-it's just that talking... is difficult for me.
Do... most people play this kind of game?
(This heat inside, it feels different? I-is it love?)
(Am I still trying to learn? O-Or am I just enjoying this? Either way, I do not dislike this.)
I used to go weeks without saying a word. I guess I'm making up for lost time here.
I-I wish I was more like my sister, kind and thoughtful.
I-I... thank you. I lack experience in beach wear, so... it is nice to hear I do not look as odd as I feel.
Thank you. In the past, I rarely wore anything like this. So... I appreciate that I do not look as out of place as I feel.
Indeed. You seem to understand what it's like.
Yes. It seems you are quick to grasp what I mean.
It's Lae-va-tane. I would appreciate if you would say it correctly.
Disrespecting my name is the same as disrespecting my weapon. So I would appreciate if you would say it right!
Oh, you're back. D-Don't make me worry about you again.
Welcome back. I would appreciate it if I did not have to worry about you again.
It is the armor of a general of Muspell. Wearing it is a show of my strength.
My armor is that of a Muspellian general. It displays the strength I have used to earn it.
"Embarrassment"... I have never felt it. Perhaps I must to achieve my goal.
I do not know what embarrassment feels like. That is part of what I must fix.
No. I'm fighting for Askr and rebuilding Muspell now. I do not know who "Grimm" is.
No. Right now, I am fighting for Askr and trying to rebuild my kingdom. I would have little time to fight this "Grimm"
No, I would feel uneasy were Laevatein to leave my side.
No. I am not ready to part ways with Laevatein.
...My sword shares my name as we shared a purpose. Do you believe you share a purpose with your weapon?
...No. I am from Muspell. I have never heard of this... "Liyue".
Those feelings... I find them understandable. I think it would be a comfort to find someone familiar here as well.
Hm, I believe I understand those feelings, finding someone familiar in this odd game... It would be a comfort to me too.

condition.saying: (She and Xinyan would actually get along quite well.) Laevatein, do you find life easier when you have a companion who's much more outgoing?

case.state: Hm, Sharena is outgoing. Due to her I have had experiences I would not have thought possible. Yes... I enjoy her company.

condition.saying: Laevatein? Are you a fan of high-energy music? (I wonder if Laevatein and Xinyan would get along. They'd balance each other out.)

case.state: Hm, what little music I have heard has made me feel much... Yet I find too much of it can be... tiresome.
A-And why is that? T-There is nothing odd which stands out to me.
However... I now work to complete the last order she gave me. To live and think for myself...
Yes... I have a goal now. My sister's last order was for me to live for myself. I will achieve that.
(Petra and Hilda... those names sound familiar. How do I know them?)
Something like that. I have tried other weapons when the situation called for it.
Indeed. Although I have used other weapons before. I even tried magic once.
I see. So you are the... leader of this "Planeptune"?
So, you are the leader of "Planeptune" right?
Before, every day was just more fighting. I have opened my eyes to more options now.
Before every day brought only more fighting, Now I have learned... more, such as swimming. I still enjoy training though.
I... I have an audience? I-I was not prepared for such a possibility.
Are you implying I would try to lose? I will do no such thing.
I would never try to fail. If I do lose, it will be for my own lack of strength.
Y-Yes... I suppose that would be my title. Though it is strange to hear it from another.
That is... a difficult question for me... I-I do not know I would e-even have the words to describe any... fantasies. Perhaps you could give some e-examples?
Am I that obvious? A-And even if I desired your... help. How would you go about doing that...
N-No, we were quite close. But... she is no longer with me...
I am not sure if I understand completely. But I will try and answer to best of my ability.
W-While it good to know more about the world... Perhaps that is to detailed of an explanation...
I-It is not something I do often. I-In fact, one of my first times... may be at this game.
I am not particularly wise. Yet even I knew that.
If you must, but I would appreciate if you said it correctly. Also, what is a "lava lamp"?
It's Lay-va-tein. But if you must use a nickname, apply it to my weapon as well.
I'm not too partial to any nickname. But if you must, call my blade the same.
I have trained with many weapons, but I enjoy my sword the most.
I'll always use my sword when I can. We are inseparable.
Yes, me and my blade share our name. We are one and the same.
Indeed, we are both lethal tools. It makes sense we share a name.
O-Oh, thank you. But my armor is hot, not cool.
Well, th-thank you. I do not think my armor would be cool though.
I've never been one for history. But I think it was due to our creator: the flame dragon Muspell.
I've never cared for history. But I remember my sister saying it was an ability the flame dragon Muspell, gave us.
I-I do not think I chose to become a soldier. Yet it is something I've always done.
... Not really. Fighting just became natural to me. A part of daily life.
No, I was just told where to fight... and I fought.
I see... Me laughing would definitely be a surprise to my soldiers.
Interesting, I had not considered how opening up could affect combat ability.
I see... me laughing would be a shock for my soldiers. Although perhaps for the wrong reasons.
No. Muspell has little more than flames and brimstone.
I don't think so. Muspell is a land covered with flame. You cannot do much but survive there.
When I'm not busy? Well, either I am training, or... learning how to "live".
My responsibilities keep me busy for the most part. But when I can, I try activities that can teach me how to "live". Such as this.
Th-Thank you... you are right that much work went into this armor's creation. But... what is a "Toucannon"?
Thanks... it is true that my armor required great effort, but I would not know what a Toucannon is.
When great powers use their strength without considering their effects, they will fall. It's a lesson I know well.
When someone uses their strength without consideration, it will be their downfall. That is something I have learned.
So even loss... can bring people closer
So even loss... can bring people together.
It is a rare metal which can only be found in Muspell. It is... nice that you noticed.
It is made of a metal only found in Muspell. You... have a good eye for noticing it.
Hm? Yes, I do not think I am able to change my hair's color.
Of course, I do not know of a method to change my hair's color, even if I wanted to.

condition.saying: Hey... your outfit's really cool. What was your name, again? Laevy... Lava... time? Are you cosplaying a hero?

case.state: "Cosplay"...? I'm not familiar with the term. But if it concerns Heroes, you may be correct.
"Cosplay"? I do not know its meaning. Yet... if it pertains to Heroes, I may understand.

condition.saying: Huh. So... do they keep your wig on...? Your hairpieces. I wouldn't want to break character either.

case.state: ...Of course I keep my hair on, I cannot take it off. I don't see what that has to do with who I am.

condition.saying: H-how'd you get into good shape for that outfit, anyway? People always make fun of me for being... petite. But so are you, yet you look...

case.state: I have spent my life training my blade. A strong body was sure to follow. Yet still I must become sharper.

condition.saying: Um... Laevetein, are you a smoker...? You smell a little like a campfire... it's... weirdly nice?

case.state: O-Oh, all of Muspell's people have that effect on the air. It can be controlled with practice though.
All Muspellians have that effect on the air. A-Although it never flares this high. It must be this game.

condition.saying: ...So... is like... a special soap, or some perfume? It's... I-I want to get some. B-but in another scent. N-not to copy you. Y-your smoke scent...

case.state: Neither. It is a natural part of my body. Unless I gave some piece of my body... you could not obtain it.
It is no scent. I would not know how to imbue a scent onto you. Nor could I give you mine, unless... I gave you a piece of myself.

condition.saying: Um... Laevatein...? Where did... do you think I'd look good in a bodysuit like that? I don't even know how you'd take it off...

case.state: Hmm. A bodysuit is good for keeping armor secure on a frame. It could help someone with a... small statue.
Hmm. If you plan on wearing armor, a bodysuit could help. I could show you how to remove it here.

condition.saying: Oh wow! I just noticed that you're not that naturally perky! It's your bodysuit. I guess it would be kind of fun to have someone tear that off.

case.state: F-Fun? I-I had only considered my bodysuit's combat utility. A-And removing it evoked... something. But was that fun?

condition.saying: Hey! Laevatein! What kind of Idol are you?

case.state: I am no... "idol". I am a warrior of Muspell.
I am no idol, nor have I learned of them. They must not exist in Muspell.

condition.saying: Sorry for the mixup earlier, Laevatein... I'm more surprised you're not an Idol.

case.state: Is it really that odd? I don't think I've done anything... idol like before.
Y-Yes... She... She died protecting me.
Yes... My sister was... k-killed attempting to protect me.
She... She shielded me from our father's rage. And it killed her.
That isn't what I meant. Before, I would just follow the orders given to me. I would not be able to think of a strategy like that.
No. Before, I thought little beyond the orders I was given. Thinking of attacking like that... would have been beyond me.
You seem... wise, Meia. I can understand how others have called you "big sister".
You seem... wise, Meia. It reminds me of my older sister.
A tool is thrown way when it isn't useful. I have learned you lose much when you ignore your life's value
A tool is... disposed of when it is no longer useful. I learned there is much to be lost when you do not realize your life's worth.

condition.saying: Whoo! Kinda hot in here for a gambling den... or is it just you, Laevatein?

case.state: Oh, I apologize if I was raising the temperature in here. It was not my intention.
I did not intend to raise the temperature. I apologize if you are uncomfortable.
Hm, you sound like Sharena. I do not believe you are wrong though. I felt similar feelings when I was with my sister.
That is similar to what Sharena told me as well. I think I understand though. I felt similar feelings around me sister.

condition.saying: So this game is something like way to find to your feelings? I can read in your face that you're serious about it, so you have my full support.

case.state: Thank you... It has not been easy so far.
Thanks... I hope I will be successful as well.

condition.saying: I hope you leave your hairpieces in. Your hair looks like it would be a hassle to brush. We have that in common, by the way.

case.state: Yes, I have never understood how to manage my hair. I never saw it as important.
You are correct. I have never cared for managing my hair. It never seemed important to me.
That is correct. Though... currently I am working to rebuild... my kingdom.
Yes, I'm a soldier. I fight for the kingdom of Askr, while I work to rebuilt my homeland.

condition.saying: I wondered about your outfit for a while. Isn't it a little restrictive? How can you even fight in it?

case.state: It is what I have always fought in. I am simply accustomed to it. Though it can be restrictive at times.

condition.saying: I know this game is about undressing... but I hope you'll let me dress you up later.

case.state: Well, I-I would be uneasy in clothes I am unused to. B-But if I could see them first then... perhaps.

condition.saying: I think you have made great progress until now, Laevatein. I'm also feeling much closer to you now. Just like we were real sisters.

case.state: T-Thank you. While I do not understand why, I feel... closer to you as well. I do not dislike the feeling.

condition.saying: My! Your hair's simply gorgeous. Are you a warrior princess of some sort?
Goodness! Your hair's extremely beautiful. Are you a princess of some sort?

case.state: I suppose I would be... queen. But my title matters little, I am Laevatein.
I think my title would be Muspell's queen. But that does not matter. I am Laevatein.

condition.saying: Laevatein, would you like me to mend your armor? It's quite fine, but has seen many battles, hasn't it?

case.state: Yes, it's protected me through much. Are you skilled with repairs? I would like to ensure it's safety before anything.

condition.saying: Ah... I'm sorry, Laevatein. You have an aura of uncertainty about you. I draw a great deal of satisfaction from helping people feel comforted.

case.state: ...I suppose I am slightly anxious. This game is quite unfamiliar.

condition.saying: Laevatein... you seem so unaccustomed to having someone take care of you...
You don't often actually have a person tend to you needs, do you?

case.state: ...No. For much of my life I was told my desires and feelings did not matter. Only my sister said otherwise.

condition.saying: I hope you understand that even if this is a rather lewd place, I would happily give you any comfort you desire, Laevatein.

case.state: I-I see. I apologize if my questioning is bothersome. I am... unused to this treatment.
My sister...? She was kind and patient with me. Even when I failed.
... My sister was kind and always tried to teach me. Even when others did not give that chance.
Hm, it is strange. I do not recognize you. Perhaps we have met in Askr?
How odd. I do not believe I have seen you before. Have you ever visited a land called Askr?
Hm, I have never heard of this therapy concept before. Perhaps you could explain it?
There are still many aspects of the world... that I do not understand. Could you... explain this therapy?
I do not believe it is possible for one's body to be made of metal. Er... I am well trained, if that was your meaning.
My body has often been compared to a weapon. B-But I do not believe that was your meaning...
I am no... robot. But I apologize if I am... overly serious. Expressing emotion... it is not an easy thing for me.
I... do not know what a robot is... But I apologize for my cold tone. Expressing emotion is not something I am used to.
It is? And for what reason is that?
Hm, It is? We have never met before. Why does meeting me... please you?
...You may shorten my name if you'd like. I... have come to understand that my name is not
... You may use another name for me if you'd like. I have learned my name... it is not typical.
I understand my name is not... typical. So I do not mind if you shorten it. I suppose... "Laevy" works as well as any other.
I have become used to people shortening my name, so I do not mind. I suppose... "Laevy" works as well as any other name...

condition.saying: So! Laeva... Layve... uh, how do you pronounce your name again?

case.state: ... It is pronounced "Lay-va-tane". If you wish to shorten it, it would not bother me.
My name is pronounced "Lay-va-tane" You may choose another name for me if you'd like. I am used to it.
I-I do not know. I do not believe it is a realm I could point out on a map. Should I describe it?
It is... hard to describe. I do not even know if Muspell could be found on a map. Perhaps I should describe it?
Why I fight... I am still learning that for myself...
Why I fight...? I can not answer that yet. I-I am still learning that for myself.
I prefer to be separated from Laevatein as little as possible... so yes.
If possible, I prefer to keep my blade with me at all times. So yes... I suppose I do carry it with me everywhere.
Yes I am. How do you know of Muspell? Do you work with the Order of heroes?
Yes I am. Although I work with the Order of Heroes now. You seem familiar.
Cos-play? I-I don't know what that is. A-A lot of effort did go into my armor's creation though.
I cannot say I know what a "cosplay" is. But this armor has been worth the effort to make it.
I was raised to be nothing more than a lethal tool. But perhaps I can be more.
My father raised me to be nothing more than a weapon. A weapon has no thoughts or feelings
That is what I am here to learn. If I knew how to "lighten up", I would.
H-How can I lighten up? I-I think that's what I am here to learn.
I don't believe I am playing a character. Like I said, I have little experience with "cosplay".
Huh? I'm not playing any character. Even if I wanted to, I would not know how.
W-Well, I train a lot or do various jobs for the Order of Heroes. Although most of those are fighting.
Before, I spent my days training. Although now I must focus on rebuilding Muspell.
Before, I did little more than fight. Now I must focus on "living", for my sister's sake.
Calm down, I'm not going t--- Are you even listening?
Please calm down. I will not hur--- Are you even listening?
Stop. I have no reason to fight you, so I won't.
Stop. What I intend to do has nothing to do with you.
"Character class"...? I am a type of fighter. If that is what you are asking.
A "character class"...? I am a form of soldier, if that is what you were asking.
Th-thank you. My sister used to say something similar. It is odd to hear it from someone else.
O-Oh, my sister used to tell me that. I am... not used to hearing it from someone else.
I don't do much for fun. This... game is a new experience for me.
I... do little "for fun". A-And playing a game like this is a rarity for me.
N-No, I have never tried it. What makes you ask?
No. I have never done blacksmithing. Why do you ask?
I… I required my sister’s help to put on this… top. S-Since she is not here… I have no choice.
B-Being in this outfit distracted me... That must be why I lost.
I am already exposed in this outfit. Is that not enough?
I did not wish for it to get this far, but now I have no choice but to use this.
(Can I really do this?)
I won't be removing my hairpieces. T-They are too important to me.
A single loss is no cause for concern!
One loss doesn't matter when you're ahead. (But would Laegjarn agree?)
(Must I win to feel? Or simply play...) I must be more cautious.
I’m still ahead? Prince Alphonse's strategy is working.
I still have time to figure out a plan, this is alright.
I'm still in the lead, maybe I can learn to enjoy this.
Perhaps I was too confident.
Perhaps this swimsuit is to blame for my poor performance.
B-But that was a good hand!
Will I just be removing my armor? How could that provoke feelings...?
Alright, I'll give it a chance.
I... I feel a little dazed.
You are all very... patient.
I don't understand.
How has it come this far?
(If this goes any further, I may have to remove Laevatein.)
I'll just think of it... like any other order.
Acknowledged. Let us carry o-on!
I'll do what I've been ordered to.
And so it goes, another item removed.
I... feel a little different than last time.
(All these eyes on me…)
I've returned from greater losses than this!
I-I will fail no more!
There will be no rest for me, it seems.
Were my sister here... this would be different.
This is my own fault. Were I just stronger...
(My head is racing!)
This is all luck anyway!
I should be better! Losing is a weakness!
Don't think this means you've won!
(I must think carefully) these are my last chances.
M-Must I fear failure?
This game seemed so simple at first...
I-I thought I was better than this...
Well O-of course I'm losing! I can't fight without my armor!
At least I still have Laevatein. That's a consolation.
Laegjarn was patient with me. Even when I failed...
I-I am not weak!
I-It was not that much effort... But I thank you for noticing.
While I did not spend much effort on them... I thank you for noticing anyway.
Indeed, it has allowed me to enjoy the summer festivities despite my inexperience. I am quite grateful for it.
It has allowed me to enjoy the beach despite my lack of ability with swimming. I am quite... happy with it.
It is rare to see a Muspellian laugh in public. They fear others will perceive weakness from it.
You... do not know Muspell. Its people know little joy there.
Ah, So it's similar to how I felt stronger when I fought with my sister, more confident.
When my sister and I would fight together, I felt stronger with her. If my solders could feel the same, then...
I-I apologize. I took it as disrespect against me and my weapon. C-carry on then.
T-True enough, i-it's just... I take my weapon very seriously.
Y-You have met my father before? A-And my sister? Just who are you?
Had you met my sister and I before... then surely I should remember you. Yet I do not. Just who are you?
While I did have a sister. She to was from Muspell. So I do not know who you are referring too.
That is true... Is there anything you wish to know? Much is still unfamiliar to me, so answering... may not be easy.
Much of my world is unknown to me... I-I do not know how I will be in helping you learn...
I-I see...I have never been compared in such a way... I-It seems quite odd. What was the purpose of such a comparison?
I have never considered the... reasoning behind my armor's design. It simply provides protection when I need it. And that is enough.
Before, I was a lethal tool, without thought, or feeling. If I am to say I am truly... living I must do both. Or else I'd just be a blade.
Before... I was a tool to execute orders. But tools do not think, nor feel. I must learn to do both if I am to say that I am... truly alive.
Games... I have tried a few on recommendation. Yet, few keep my attention.
Games... I have tried them on the Princess's ord--- request. Yet this game is one of the few to hold my attention
Indeed, it is not uncommon for realms to be named after founding dragons. Perhaps they were once worshiped.
Yes, now that I think about it, many realms share names with founding dragons. Maybe they were worshiped like gods once.
O-Oh, well thank you for the compliment. (I'm pretty sure that was a compliment.)
Th-Thank you, my armor is very important to me. But to be sure, that was a compliment, right?
It appears we are in similar situations then, since I have become Muspell's leader.
It seems your situation is not unlike mine. I have become the leader of Muspell.
Wait, you are a goddess? I find that hard to believe. Although I guess I've never seen a goddess before.
I... suppose it is. But what could I do to change it?
Perhaps... you are right. But could it be changed?
Ah, my armor was designed after a Muspellian raven. It sounds similar to this "Toucannon".
W-What is a "froot loop"? Wouldn't turning fruit into a loop waste most of it?
Muspell---my homeland---fought a war and lost. As its only remaining... princess, it falls to me to rebuild.
My homeland fought an ill-fated war and was devastated. As the last surviving member of its royal family, it falls to me to rebuild.
Hm, perhaps an audience's feedback would be useful in determining my progress.
Hm, i-it is true I do not fully understand this game... But if victory is not the main purpose, what is?
I-I have never considered such a thing before. P-Perhaps some who is kind and patient, yet still strong. Perhaps that demands too much...
T-That was... more then I was expecting. Though that last one, it did not sound... bad.
O-Oh. You seem... experienced. B-But i do not know if I am ready for... that.
My sister... She died protecting me from our father. I-I was to be given a punishment for my failure. My sister volunteered instead and... and it killed her.
S-Slowdown! I-I do not know if I understood even half of what you meant. B-But well...
O-Of course not. T-Though until recently, such feelings were foreign to me. Perhaps I have not had the chance to explore them.
W-Why are you telling me such things. I-It is not as if I shall perform such as act!
Hmph, I did love my sister, but not in the way you mean. She was kind and patient with me and I looked up to her. I would not do such things with her.
My fath--- Lord Surtr trained me as a weapon. Feelings would not help me complete my orders.
Yes, feelings offer no benefit for a soldier. Or at least that is what I was taught.
I've seen women like you in the Order of Heroes. How can you fight while being so exposed?
And are you not overexposed? One good strike could kill you.
You would be correct. I fought for Muspell, the kingdom of flames.
Yes, I fought for Muspell. Only the strong survive there.
I-It is? W-Well maybe I didn't give it enough credence,
Me and my weapon share a name. It would be wrong if we did not.
Me and my blade share our name. I would feel uneasy if we ever did not.
Of course it's made of metal. It would not be able to protect me otherwise.
armor without metal? Does such a thing even exist?
(My own?) Y-You don't have to compliment me so much. M-My sister did most of the work an-anyway.
(It's mine?) You're... um, nice. But my sister did almost everything for me.
Well, mostly sword fighting. But I'd like to learn other styles.
I fight with my sword. Always have.
Of course, I... think I understand. Your crew needed something to keep you stable, and found it in each other.
...Yes, I think I understand. Your mutual bond gives you purpose, and a way forward.
Yes... but if the realm was built on corruption, the battle could be... in vain.
Yes... but if the corruption was a way of life for a realm's people, could change even come to pass?

condition.saying: At least you've got lots of small things you can take off if you don't want to get embarrassed.

case.state: Becoming embarrassed... I have never had that feeling. Perhaps, to become in touch with my emotions, I must.
Hmm, I have never felt embarrassment. Perhaps I need to in order to truly understand emotions.

condition.saying: I know I made a joke about you being hot earlier... but you're actually really cool... Laevatein...

case.state: Was that... admiration? I-I do not know what I have done to earn it. B-But... thank you.
W-Was that... admiration in your voice? I-I don't understand why I've earned it. B-But... thank you.

condition.saying: N-Nevermind! Just accept the compliment! You look great, and I'm just jealous!

case.state: H-have I upset you? I did not intend this. p-perhaps we should move on.

condition.saying: Whoa... uh... nevermind. How does that come up?

case.state: Holding proper conversation still eludes me. I-I apologize if I have said anything... inappropriate.
I-I still lack skill with proper conversations. B-But have I said something that offended?
Yes, they are a similar pink color. Perhaps that is not the only similarity we share.
Hmm, they are alike in color. Maybe that isn't the only thing we share.
I-I... of course. W-Would it be weird were my hair not?
I-Is there value in fully shaving? I-If you do it... perhaps I should try it.
W-Was that a compliment? I-I fail to see how hair could bring out my eyes...
Di-Did you mean to compliment me? I-It is lost on me. I don't understand how hair could bring out eyes.

condition.saying: Oh... I see. Do you... sing, then?

case.state: No. Singing has always seemed a frivolity to me. So I have never had any reason to try.
No. I've only focused on becoming sharper, so I never had any reason to attempt it.

condition.saying: Well, I'd still love to hear you sing!

case.state: Would you? Perhaps I lack skill in singing. It would not be worth hearing.
Why? I have never tried singing, so I lack skill with it. The results would not please you.
I... I have never had that happen to me. I have done little but train and fight since I was born. But... t-that does sound embarrassing.
N-No... I meant that I've never been in an embarrassing situation. From a young age, all I did was fight and train. T-That does sound like it would embarrass me though.
It is alright. My homeland... Muspell is similar. Many are born... yet few survive.
It is alright. I do not believe you meant to offend. A pair of sisters is an uncommon sight in my homeland as well.
... I am aware of that now. Yet it is hard to... separate myself from my previous way of life.
Yes... that seems right. Yet it is difficult to... unlearn what I have been taught all my life.
When I heard of my sister's death, I intended to fight her killers, even if I lost my life. her final wish made me realize what a mistake it would have been.
I see why she would take to you. You are not short on wisdom to share.
I am not... surprised she would come to you. Our... conversation has shown me you have much wisdom to share.

condition.saying: Hey, I'm not uncomfortable in the slightest; I'm more worried about my heart beating too fast!

case.state: ...Would your heart beating too fast not be uncomfortable? That is typically a sign of panic, right?

condition.saying: Oh, don't worry, girl - the only temperature you're raising is the one in my heart!

case.state: ...Are you sure? I have heard an overactive heart is a sign of panic, and that is not comfortable.

condition.saying: I'm not sure what feelings you'll discover, though, but... well, I think you'll have fun with this.

case.state: You seem... experienced. I hope I can trust you on that.

condition.saying: But if you want we could take a bath together after the game and I'd brush them for you.

case.state: I don't know. I have only bathed with my sister before.
I am... unsure about that. I have only shared a bath with my sister previously.

condition.saying: I prefere my clothes a little more loose, so I can move around in it more easily.

case.state: That is understandable. I have tried other types of armor before, but...

condition.saying: I was always too busy to play or give my clothes to anyone younger than me, and Colette wasn't... well, she was like an ironing board. And that wouldn't work...

case.state: I-I do not know if... your clothes would fit my build.

condition.saying: Hm... I suppose you're ready, though. I'm strangely proud for you!

case.state: T-Thank you. Hearing that... makes this a bit easier.

condition.saying: Ah. Well, I know a thing or two, and I know a woman like you could use some tender love and care!
I hope you don't mind me saying so, but I believe you of all people could use a little pampering.

case.state: Hm? What about me makes you say that?
Oh, n-not that I mind your offer. But what would I expect from your... care?

condition.saying: Ah! And after I've mended your armor, perhaps I could give you a hot bath? You look like you love a nice, steamy bath!

case.state: Bathing was always a rushed experience growing up. I did enjoy the time it allowed me to be with my sister.

condition.saying: So, please. Anything you need. I'm right here for you. Leave your worries with me and let me pamper you.

case.state: Well, it is not that I do not trust you... but I may need m-more time.

condition.saying: Poor girl. Here, give me that when you're done with it.

case.state: ...Alright. B-But only for the time being. I will require them back.
I have never considered it like that. But... I am not sure I am capable of helping others like she did, currently.
That is a... pleasant thought. I wonder if I will ever be able to help others like she did?

condition.saying: There's no ulterior motives, Laevatein. While I do find you cute, I'm much more interested in your health and wellness than anything you could do for me.

case.state: That attitude is... admirable. Such feelings are rare in my homeland. I-I suppose I am unused to them.
I see. This... therapy, it sounds quite useful. Do you believe it could help me become more in tune with my emotions?
Hm, if I understand correctly, this therapy does sound helpful. Would it help me learn how to express emotion?
Oh, I see. W-Well, I do not intend to lose. Perhaps you may not see it after all.
It appears I've misunderstood. But I do not believe I will lose. I apologize if you do not see what you wish to.
That is correct. I was told I would experience a myriad of emotions through a game like this.
Yes. I was advised a game like this would help me in experiencing unfamiliar emotions.
Attached... yes I suppose I am attached to my blade. Tell me, is it... odd for one to attached to a weapon?
That is true. Swords and axes require different techniques to properly use. However, it is not a bad idea to become well-acquainted with both.
Hm, why do you wish to avoid training? It is a benefit to both the mind and body.
I do not believe such a weapon exists. Though why do want to avoid training? It offers benefits to both one's mind and body.
It was not my choice to share my name with my weapon. Though I do not believe I would change it given the choice.
I did not choose to hold the same name as my blade. Although... even now, I do not believe i would change it.
Ah, I apologize. I believe I misunderstood you then. The phrase was... unfamiliar to me.
Oh... I apologize. It appears I misunderstood you. The phrase you used... it was unfamiliar to me...
Oh, I apologize. I was... unfamiliar with that usage of... "nicknames" S-So... You would say we are... friends?
Oh, I am sorry. I had not heard of "nicknames" being used that way before. S-So... I am a friend to you?
... I do not believe there is much to see in Muspell... It is a barren land.
... I would not advise traveling to Muspell right now. It is quite... barren.
Now? I fight for my sister. Or... rather I fight to fulfill what she wished for me.
My only goal is to fight for my sister. Or at least, to fulfill her final wish for me.
That is acceptable... Pit.
It was designed after a raven of Muspellian myth. I've never understood why.
Yes, it was designed after a raven, one that brought death apparently. Does it frighten you?
I-I suppose calming down could not hurt. But I do not understand what "wooing a lass" is.
W-Would "wooing a lass" teach me to feel? If so, I could try it. Whatever it is.
Well, I suppose it was not an order. It's just easier for me to think of it that way.
No this is not a "BDSM fetish thing", whatever that is. A... friend suggested I come here, and... I listened.
I don't know what this game will show me. I don't know if I'll learn anything at all.
I can't say what this game will show me, but I hope it works. Are you here for a similar reason, Bernadetta?
It's more. Laevatein's flames burn bright.
It is more than a symbol. The flames that burn on Laevatein are very much real.
Yes. Me and my blade share a name. We shared purposes as well.
Yes. My weapon and I share names. I was meant to be a tool since birth.
Well, I know very little magic, though I could be called a knight now.
Well, my knowledge of magic is small. Fighting with Askr may make me a knight, though.
I have never heard of such... nonsense. Though I know little of forging... magical weapons.
W-What are you saying? I-I don't think I understand.
Ah, I'm more adept at using weapons than making them. Laevatein is all I need anyway.
I see. I'm skilled at using weapons, not making them. I only need Laevatein anyway.
Y-You wouldn't mean... n-no, I-I could not answer th-that.
I do not typically wear a bracelet such as this. Putting it on was... harder than I thought.
There seems to be little point to these flowers. I do not mind losing them.
I have heard some find the beach’s hot sand unpleasant. But compared to sand in Muspell… It does not bother me.
...I suppose I must reveal my swimsuit. I should hope you will not ogle me afterward.
T-This jacket is intended to aid my swimming. Swimming seemed so simple at first… It is not.
I am finally baring it all. I… I hope I am ready.
Losing is nothing to be upset about. Tears won’t put out a fire.
These boots were a gift from my sister... I miss her sometimes.
I-I don't have many chances left after my top...
I-If I must bare it all... Then I will.
I-Is it wrong to strip so brazenly?
R-Right. I lose, I strip.
The offer is appreciated. However, I do not believe I shall be wearing those again.
While that sounds... helpful. I see little point in wearing these again.
A-Are you quite certain? I-I mean, there is no one in particular... but you are certain, yes?
We share the same purpose as a lethal tool. It makes sense we share the same name.
I-I did not choose to be named this way. Perhaps it was a joke from my father.
Me and my sword are one and the same in purpose. Tools to carry out orders.
W-What are you muttering about? I-I can hardly understand a word at your speed.
As a descendent of the dragon Muspell... my blood burns with His flame. However, I can only manifest it through my blade, Laevatein.
While the blood of the flame god Muspell flows through me... It can only safely be channeled through the use of my blade. Was that helpful?
...I would not be opposed to meeting this... companion of yours. Perhaps doing so would allow me to move closer to completing my goal.
It also provides a layer between my skin, and my armor. Useful during combat. Yet its transparency is.. less so, in this game.
I-I apologize... W-Was that too much?
A-Alright I suppose it couldn't hurt. (Something in her voice sounded... off.)
I-I don't know about that. Although this game has been entertaining, if not a little jarring. Perhaps that is its appeal.
I-I don't know about that, I have little knowledge about... sexuality. But this game has been interesting, if not a little surprising. Perhaps that is its appeal.
I had not considered that. You look knowledgeable. What would you recommend?
I-It is just I have little experience with them. But you look knowledgeable on the topic. What would you recommend?
W-Well, It was not my initial idea. But a game like this is bound to elicit emotion, right?
I-It was a recommendation. But a game like this must bring forth emotion of some kind, I think.
O-Oh, all Muspellians are like that. It can be controlled with practice though.
All of Muspell's people have that effect. My sister taught me to control it though.
I can see your sincerity. Even if I do not fully understand what cosplay is.
Your nation? And which one is that?
Your world's nations? W-What are they like?
No, my fath--- Lord Surtr ruled and my sister would have been after. But both of them are gone now.
No, I was only a fighter before, yet now I am the only one left who can lead. Even if I do not know how.
I... apologize, it is not your responsibility to fix my problems.
I'm sorry... I should not force others to help fix my problems.
That many? Your world must hold immeasurable strength then...
Something that tastes like fruit, but is not? Interesting. (Perhaps I could bring fruit to Muspell with that.)
These "Froot Loops" taste like fruit, but aren't? Than perhaps I could introduce it to Muspell.
Are you sure? I did not know Muspell's creatures were well known enough to have differing names.
Can that be? I did not know that Muspellian creatures were widespread enough to have different names across different realms.
On second thought... I do not believe I want feedback from your particular audience.
I-I see...I did not consider that when arriving here, but perhaps I could learn to enjoy it as you do.
...Even still, I do not wish to burden others unnecessarily. ...Perhaps you could learn from that.
W-What? N-No, that is all. You do not need to push any further.
Oh. While I was considering your offer before, I will do so no longer. i do not wish to be some... attraction for your audience!
T-That was not an easy story for me to tell... I would have hoped you would not use it as entertainment...
I-I...um, w-well... N-None of them! How could I be expected to answer when I lack the knowledge to do so!
That... That is my hope as well.
My... My feelings? You're methods do not sound particularly inviting. But I will keep that in mind as a way to express feelings.
And now that you have your answer. I should hope I will not hear questions like that again.
A-And anyway, does it matter what I wear? I'll just be taking it off.
Fighting with Askr has shown me that is true. Yet it is hard to change after so long.
I see your point, yet I do not know how to change.
Were you saying something? Oh... she fainted.
I-It definitely was not. T-This suit is-isn't even meant to be seen!
N-No! It's supposed to help my armor fit better. It-It's not helpful for a game like this!
(Something feeling wrong here.) O-Oh, thank you.
Well, thank you. But I'm confused. Do you want anything from me?
I-I guess I do wear it well. I have a question: Are you looking for something from me?
No, it is more akin to being a soldier. The cost is taken care of.
It's closer to the military variety, so it's funded one way or the other.
Yes... my sister was killed protecting me from my failure. I won't forget her sacrifice.
...my sister died protecting me from my father's anger after I failed. I miss her greatly.
How odd. Seeking war is not a gendered trait. I have met many bloodthirsty women.
Intriguing. Blood lust is not a gendered trait. I have met many female fighters capable of it.
N-No... more like "moo-spell" Sharena made a similar mistake as well.
It is closer to "moo-spell". My friend Sharena made the same mistake the first time too.
